mapper.insert: insert into documentboard(f_id, f_title, f_content, f_emp_id, f_date, f_hit) values(doc_seq.nextval, #{f_title}, #{f_content}, #{f_emp_id}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select f_id, f_title, f_content, f_emp_id, f_date, f_hit from documentboard where f_id = #{f_id}
select f_id, f_title, f_content, f_emp_id, f_date, f_hit from documentboard where f_id > 0 order by f_id desc, f_date desc
select count(f_id) from documentboard where f_id > 0

select d.f_id, d.f_title, d.f_content, d.f_emp_id, d.f_date, d.f_hit, e.emp_nm as f_emp_nm from documentboard d, emp e where f_id > 0 and d.f_emp_id = e.emp_id
order by f_id desc
select count(f_id) from documentboard where f_id > 0
mapper.update: update documentboard set f_hit = f_hit + 1 where f_id = #{f_id}
